concepts.label: CCYYMMDDhhmm
concepts.description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for series with freq. higher than daily) year/month/day/hours/minutes

concepts.label: CCYYMMDD
concepts.description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for daily and business series) year/month/day

concepts.label: CCYYWW
concepts.description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for weekly series) year/week

concepts.label: CCYYMM
concepts.description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for monthly series) year/month

concepts.label: CCYYQ
concepts.description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for quarterly series) year/quarter

concepts.label: CCYYS
concepts.description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for half yearly series) year/semester

concepts.label: CCYY
concepts.description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for annual series) year

concepts.label: CCYYMMDDhhmmCCYYMMDDhhmm
concepts.description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for series with freq. higher than daily) year/month/day/hours/minutes to year/month/day/hours/minutes

concepts.label: CCYYMMDDCCYYMMDD
concepts.description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for daily and business series) from year/month/day to year/month/day

concepts.label: CCYYWWCCYYWW
concepts.description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for weekly series) from year/week to year/week

concepts.label: CCYYMMCCYYMM
concepts.description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for monthly series) from year/month to year/month

concepts.label: CCYYQCCYYQ
concepts.description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for quarterly series) from year/quarter to year/quarter

concepts.label: CCYYSCCYYS
concepts.description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for half yearly series) from half-year to half-year

concepts.label: CCYYCCYY
concepts.description: (Used in SDMX-EDI for annual series) from year to year
